definition: surname Yin/dynasty name at the end the Shang dynasty, after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province
surname Yin/dynasty name at the end the Shang dynasty, after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province

sentences.english: On the first day of school, a mother taking her child to school worriedly repeats her instructions.
sentences.chinese: 開學第一天，送小孩上學的媽媽不放心地殷殷叮嚀。

sentences.english: It seems that someone is whispering in her ears, protecting her at all times.
sentences.chinese: 似乎有人一直在她耳邊殷殷叮嚀，時時保護着她。

sentences.english: Warm hearted wishes for an old-fashioned Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 傳統佳節來臨之際，獻上聖誕節的殷殷祝福。

sentences.english: A maiden's carefree heart cherishes ardent benevolence.
sentences.chinese: 悠悠少女心，殷殷慈悲意。

definition: to entrust a task to sb else
urgently/eagerly/worried/(urge sb to) be sure to/it is absolutely essential to (follow the above instruction)
to regret leaving/reluctant to part/(onom.) young leaves stir gently in the wind
to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
on leaving/on the point of departure
to look forward eagerly to sth/keenly desired
